submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        m = n // 2
        d = [0] * (k + 1)
        c = [0] * (k + 1)
        for i, num in enumerate(nums[:m]):
            a, b = max(num, nums[n -i - 1]), min(num, nums[n -i -1])
            d[a - b] += 1
            c[max(k - b, a)] += 1
        ans = n
        ac = 0
        for x, t in enumerate(c):
            
            ans = min(ans, ac - d[x] + m)
            ac += t
        return ans
